attributes.additional_details:
Legislate new-&-renewal Driving-Licence applicant's supply living-fingerprint's; typically-with Post Office 'curtains'.

Together-with signature-& head-&-shoulder's image SHOULD tie-in with HMRC [IRS] record's.

Living-fingerprint's increasing-important with vehicle 'rent-by-the-hour' [e.g., MIT City-Car]; banned-driver's identified-automatically BEFORE rental-car is-released & payment-taken.
